title: Mastery Score gone???
body: i logged in after the update and all my champion masteries are gone it says total mastery level 0 is this normal??

replies.body: Same like i hope it is a bug because i'm a proud lvl 6 garen main and i will not take this BECAUSE I CANT LIVE WITHOUT THE GLORY OF DEMACIA
I have nearly 250k mastery on J4 GLORY TO DEMACIA!! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Same, but it's only in my collection. On my profile page it says I have a 247 Mastery score(as I should) and it shows my highest mastery champions with the correct levels and number of points. I still have all my tokens in my loot too.
I can't unlock chests for s games on champs I had already earned it on, so the data is still saved it is just not displaying for some reason.

i think this happened to everyone, but what pisses me off is that when i play more games with the champ, the mastery points don't even go up
> kill me

Seems as if we all suffer from the same symptoms, thus this is a bug. However, Riot needs to understand that some of us use that as our playing guide, as in my case. For instance, I try to play my lowest champions, but now, I can't tell who that is, thus I am done until they fix it. 

I even tried their repair option, along with a reboot. There is no fix except for Riot to fix it.

Patched software but not fully tested is alarming.
Yup.. all my masteries are gone, but when I hover over my name I still see the number. Hope it'll be fixed soon, this stinks :|

I really hope that Riot can fix this problem. A couple of weeks ago my friends list got wiped and after contacted Riot support they told me it was gone forever. Now all my masteries are gone... This is very alarming!
Mine have also been reduced to zero unless I am looking at my most played champs in ranked stats
it hapenned to me too feelsbad
Same thing happened to me, I can see it in my profile but not collection... happened after I patched it last night.??
Same http://imgur.com/gallery/xuJzf
I have the same problem :/ probably (hopefully) a bug...
Same happened to me :/
Same here! Previous posts said that you just have to restart client but even that does not help this problem..

Oce same here :V
http://puu.sh/x5v9x/b4969d0ef5.jpg
SAME HERE BRO.
Me too, on both my EUW and EUNE account. Tried the full repair, but it didn't help.

Happening to me too, weirdly. Seems to be a problem with the new patch again.
I HAD 29 CHAMPS IN LVL 4 AND UP ;W; lvl 5 garen here GLORY FOR DEMACIA{{sticker:garen-swing}}
Rito don't steal our Master YI.
Yi for the win!!!
Same here, But  you still get Tokens.

wtf why riot changes the champ points to zero
._.
Same here but 3 months later hope riot does something.

I went ahead and double checked this account, and it looks like you still have plenty of mastery level 5 and even a 6. This might have just been a weird visual bug, so try relogging and let me know if you still don't see your old masteries.
fixed now thank god
They fixed the bug

i logged in after the update and all my champion masteries are gone it says total mastery level 0 is this normal??
SAME HERE IT IS ANNOYING AS HELL WANT TO WORK ON MY NEXT CHEST
500 mastery score riot bring it back{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
same, NA. cant sort by mastery in collection. Also cant change from online to away. mastery score shows up when hovering over my summoner name. but collection tab is all wrong for me
If this isn't a bug I'm gonna cry. But I reinstalled the game and came back to it being at 0, anyone else?
Same I got so worried i thought Rito took away my lvl 7 quinn but when i looked at my profile the mastey was still on her also the chest thiing is gone so i cant see who i have gotten a chest on
weird its working for me

Same

Check out this forum page. Riot Eambo Responded. It's just a visual bug.
(https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-reports-eu/9x5je8Ex-mastery-returned-to-0-after-the-patch-716-update)
Well, it seems my mastery levels still exist since my top 3 in my profile still have their levels. This gives me hope that this will be an easy fix, but if not Riot is gonna get a ton of shit for it.

Same :(
Hope it's fixed soon.
Does it actually affect matches tho?. Like if u want to use ur mastery emote can u still do so?
I lost my mastery score as well, in my collections page at least. On my profile menu it says the correct amount of points. Hope this doesn't affect gameplay
Yep, me too
Same here :/
